reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 101/02: EXTENDING TERM OF VALIDITY OF MOTORIZED SNOW VEHICLE PERMITS
reg_info.reg_name_text: EXTENDING TERM OF VALIDITY OF MOTORIZED SNOW VEHICLE PERMITS
reg_info.act_under: Motorized Snow Vehicles Act   Loi sur les motoneiges

content.content: 1. Despite subsection 18 (3) of Regulation 804 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990, the term of validity of a motorized snow vehicle permit is extended beyond the expiry date shown on the permit until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the permit would expire on or after the day this Regulation comes into force. O. Reg. 101/02, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Despite subsection 18 (3) of Regulation 804 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990, the term of validity of a motorized snow vehicle permit is extended beyond the expiry date shown on the permit until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the permit would expire on or after the day this Regulation comes into force. O. Reg. 101/02, s. 1.
